column4: Hi everyone: can someone help me with this problem I have with CDs and DVDs not mounting? I get this error: "Unable to mount the volume...[CD/DVD name]...mount: mount point /media/cdrom0 does not exist"

In between pastings I was looking around to see if I could find the answer. I know that sometimes people don't notice messages the first time. The guy who was helping me said he needed to go to sleep and to ask someone else
are you using the terminal to mount?
